DataElement.preferredName: Prior Bcl-2 Family Protein Inhibitor Exposure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to exposure to any agent of the Bcl-2 family inhibitors as outlined in the study protocol.
